title: Smart Data Models - Organization
description: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc, mapped from schema.org

aggregateRating.description: Property. The average rating based on multiple ratings or reviews. Privacy:'low'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

itemReviewed.description: Relationship. The item that is being reviewed/rated.

author.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.

bestRating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The highest value allowed in this rating system. If bestRating is omitted, 5 is assumed.

reviewAspect.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. This Review or Rating is relevant to this part or facet of the itemReviewed

legalName.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/legalName'. The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

taxID.description: Property. Model: 'https://schema.org/taxID'. The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.
